hero.title: AYMANE TAJANI

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: Future state engineer in the fifth year of Computer Engineering and Networks with a specialization in MIAGE at EMSI. Creative, dynamic, and collaborative, I work efficiently within teams and can adapt to various technical contexts.
